My projects

Coin Counting System Using OpenCV:

  • Technologies Used: Python, OpenCV, HTML, CSS
  • Developed a system using Python and OpenCV to automate coin counting, achieving 95% accuracy. Implemented image processing techniques for coin identification and counting.

    • Restaurant Table Reservation System:

  • Technologies Used: HTML, React, Nodejs, MySQL
  • Developed an online table reservation system to streamline restaurant bookings, reduce wait times, and enhance customer satisfaction. Implemented features for booking tables based on group size, viewing restaurant interiors, and receiving confirmation calls.
